statements: SELECT * FROM songs;

SELECT * FROM songs ORDER BY artist_name DESC;

SELECT song_name, artist_name FROM songs WHERE instrument_used = 'Guitar' ORDER BY artist_name DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT artist_name FROM songs ORDER BY artist_name;
SELECT song_name FROM songs WHERE instrument_used = 'Piano' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Song;
SELECT song_name, artist_name FROM Song;
SELECT song_id, artist_name FROM Song WHERE instrument_used='piano';
SELECT * FROM Playlist WHERE playlist_name='Favorites';
SELECT playlist_name, song_name FROM Playlist JOIN Song ON Playlist.song_id = Song.song_id;
SELECT song_name, artist_name FROM Song WHERE instrument_used = 'guitar'
SELECT * FROM Song WHERE artist_name LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY song_name DESC
SELECT playlist_name, song_name FROM Playlist JOIN Song ON Playlist.song_id = Song.song_id WHERE artist_name = 'Ed Sheeran'
SELECT DISTINCT artist_name FROM Song WHERE instrument_used IN ('piano', 'drums')
SELECT playlist_name, COUNT(song_id) AS num_songs FROM Playlist GROUP BY playlist_name HAVING num_songs > 5 ORDER BY num_songs DESC
SELECT * FROM songs;
SELECT song_id, song_name, artist FROM songs WHERE artist='Taylor Swift';
SELECT playlist_name, song_name, instrument_name FROM playlist p JOIN songs s ON p.song_id = s.song_id JOIN instruments i ON p.instrument_id = i.instrument_id;
SELECT * FROM instruments WHERE instrument_type='Percussion';
SELECT playlist_name, artist, instrument_name FROM playlist p JOIN songs s ON p.song_id = s.song_id JOIN instruments i ON p.instrument_id = i.instrument_id WHERE playlist_id=1;
SELECT * FROM songs WHERE artist = 'Artist 1';
SELECT song_name, artist FROM songs WHERE instrument_used = 'Piano' ORDER BY song_name ASC;
SELECT playlist_name, song_name, instrument_name FROM playlist p JOIN songs s ON p.song_id = s.song_id JOIN instruments i ON p.instrument_id = i.instrument_id WHERE p.playlist_id = 1;
SELECT instrument_name, COUNT(song_id) AS song_count FROM playlist p JOIN instruments i ON p.instrument_id = i.instrument_id GROUP BY instrument_name HAVING song_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM playlist ORDER BY playlist_name DESC, song_id ASC;

SELECT song_name, artist FROM songs ORDER BY artist ASC;

SELECT song_name, artist, instrument_name FROM songs JOIN song_instruments ON songs.song_id = song_instruments.song_id JOIN instruments ON song_instruments.instrument_id = instruments.instrument_id;

SELECT playlist_name, song_title FROM Playlists JOIN PlaylistSongs ON Playlists.playlist_id = PlaylistSongs.playlist_id JOIN Songs ON PlaylistSongs.song_id = Songs.song_id ORDER BY playlist_name, song_title
